editorialNotes.standard: DJing requires skill, attention to craft and hours of practice. But this free app can help. It teaches and simplifies the process of audio mixing through a slick, Apple Design Award–winning visual interface.
editorialNotes.short: Explore AI features like Nope, voice separation and remixing.

editorialNotes.standard: With this AI-powered app, musicians can perfect their performances. By isolating individual instruments in pretty much any recording, Moises helps you focus on singing lead vocals, unleashing that guitar solo, or playing bass alongside your favorite band.
